title: NER Extractor
original_prompt:
Extract the NER with the score in JSON format from the following content

{content:The main weakness of these GPT models is that they are costly to efficiently run in production and they require some advanced DevOps knowledge.  For example you should forget about running GPT-J on your own local machine or even on a CPU server. If you want it to extract your entity in a decent time (below 1 second), you will need to use a good GPU like NVIDIA RTX A6000 or NVIDIA A40.}
input1: {content: The rapid advancement of AI technologies has led to significant improvements in natural language processing. However, the deployment of these models often requires substantial computational resources and expertise in machine learning frameworks. For instance, running large models like GPT-3 or BERT on a personal computer is impractical without a high-performance GPU. Users must consider options like cloud-based solutions or dedicated servers to achieve optimal performance.}
input2: {content: In recent years, the integration of AI in various industries has transformed workflows and productivity. Despite the benefits, organizations face challenges in implementing these systems due to high operational costs and the need for specialized knowledge. For example, utilizing models such as T5 or RoBERTa effectively necessitates access to powerful hardware, which can be a barrier for smaller companies. Investing in cloud computing resources may be a viable solution for many.}
